channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 big deep potholes by bus stop, 16th January
item.description:
2 big deep potholes by bus stop. Dangerous risk for cyclists in particular

item.title: Massive deep dangerous pothole just before bridge on left as you head over the railway bridge, 16th January
item.description:
Damaged my tyre , too deep to avoid if car is coming in opposite direction. Pothole is on left heading towards Old Glos Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Multiple pot holes, some deep enough for tennis balls, 16th January
item.description:
One pot hole was fixed recently. Multiple remain. Whole road needs checking including drains from Brymore Avenue to Park Stores. One near bus stop is getting long (50cm to a meter) and deep (maybe 5cm) near the bus stop at Park Stores which will affect steering.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119, New Barn Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
